review_data.title: Great Japanese dinner.
review_data.content: Nice and cosy place, in the heart of Zurich city. Our waitress was very polite and kept smiling. The food was tasty and the chirashi dish was very fresh. I definitely recommend this restaurant to sushi lovers.

review_data.title: Great for a local and fast takeaway

review_data.title: Sushing
review_data.content: Labeled as one of the oldest sushi restaurants in Zurich, here you find high quality sushi prepared by Japanese people. Prices are a bit high for what you get but nevertheless quality is never a question. Take your shot.

review_data.title: Awesome Japanese Food
review_data.content: One of the oldest japanse restaurants in Zürich and at the moment not as trendy as Ooki or Ikoo. But from classic japanese starters over Sushi to desert - it's just fantastic! Go give it a try if you're into japanese food.
